channel.title: My clients never load all the way
channel.description:
i will download a client, and play it for awhile, and i close it,
i go to re-open it, and its stuck on connecting to update server
they are 508's. and 503's, UGH example: axedscape. ploxagescape
HELPPPPP :mad: :mad: :( :(

item.title: My clients never load all the way
item.dc:creator: @Dizaster Dizaster
item.description:
@Dizaster wrote:

it means you need runserver before you try run client of 508 servers

Read full topic

it happens on ploxagescape, and axedscape :{
